title: No loot boxes
body:
Hi all

I've earned a good amount of S ranks in a number of games, both on ARAM and Normal Drafts.

I haven't received any loot boxes though.

I am Honor level 1, so that might be it? But I asked on Reddit and was told this shouldn't affect loot boxes.

There is a padlock on my Honor symbol but I've read that means I can't go higher than Honor level 1? 

Where am I going wrong?

replies.body: If you are currently at level 1 honor, you'll need to continue playing consistently honorable to restore eligibility for honor rewards.  Once you get back to level 2, everything should be back to normal!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=W9AI0nGO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-13T22:32:32.189+0000)
>
> If you are currently at level 1 honor, you'll need to continue playing consistently honorable to restore eligibility for honor rewards.  Once you get back to level 2, everything should be back to normal!

Ohh fair enough, thanks for the reply!
